product.title: Cotswold Ghost White - Venetian Blind
product.description: Light and unassuming, the cotswold ghost white is a matt painted blind, comprising of thick, sturdy slats, a strong pelmet and headrail, and a matching bottom rail and acorns. And, treated well for protection, you can be sure that this blind won't warp or crack in use. For a fresh and inviting look in a country kitchen, couple the ghost white with a lush apple green. Use the green on the walls and match matt white tiles to the blind, then accessorise with the two tones to your heart's content.

relproducts.title: Stockholm Frost Roller Blind
relproducts.description: Stockholmfrost is an attractive, clean and crisp white colour. It will freshen up any space within the home or office. Stockholm frost fabric is moisture resistant making it a wonderful choice for kitchens and bathrooms. Their roller blinds come with various control options, including a spring pull acorn which removes the need for any cords making them inherently child safe. As with all their made to measure products this blind comes with a 5 year guarantee giving extra peace of mind when investing in this product.

relproducts.title: Stockholm Snow White Roller Blind
relproducts.description: Stockholm snow is a beautiful fresh white colour, it will work perfectly in most spaces. A real all rounder & great for brightening up any room. Stockholm snow fabric is moisture resistant making it a wonderful choice for kitchens and bathrooms. As with all their made to measure products this blind comes with a 5 year guarantee which covers all parts of the blind. relproducts.title: Oslo Blackout Frost White Roller Blind
relproducts.description: Oslo is a beautiful range of blinds with a good selection of colours. The blackout feature makes it perfect for those who want to create darkness in the room at any time. The oslo blackout frost roller blind in a neutral white colour will suit almost any room. relproducts.title: Rimini White - Roller Blind
relproducts.description: The rimini in white is a soft, fresh shade, perfect for adding light and air to any room it's placed in. Its pale colour and lightweight fabric mean that the room doesn't have to be dark every time you need a little privacy. Brighten up even the gloomiest of rooms by placing this blind in the window; it's ideal for small utility rooms or bathrooms. Alternatively, surround with pretty florals or bold bright shades in the bedroom or living room.

relproducts.title: Stockholm Paper White Roller Blind
relproducts.description: Stockholm paper is a light, off white colour. It will brighten up any room wonderfully, there is nothing fresher or more clean looking than white when dressing a window. Their stockholm paper fabric is also moisture resistant making it a wonderful choice for kitchens and bathrooms. As with all their made to measure products this blind comes with a 5 year guarantee which covers all parts of the blind ensuring you are purchasing a product that wwill stand the test of time.

relproducts.title: Valencia Simplicity Lilywhite Roller Blind
relproducts.description: When pure and simple is the order of the day, this valencia simplicity lilywhite roller blind is the perfect choice for you, and the perfect dressing for your home. The pure white colouring is simply perfect for blending in effortlessly with more neutral decors as well as add when pure and simple is the order of the day, this valencia simplicity lilywhite roller blind is the perfect choice for you, and the perfect dressing for your home.

relproducts.title: Oslo Blackout Paper White Roller Blind
relproducts.description: Their best-selling oslo blackout range comes in several colours and features a natural weave effect finish and colour-match blackout backing, perfect for adding style inside and outside your home. This soft paper white roller blind adds bold and vibrant enhancment to your room and is also made from blackout fabric, to help blackout the light when desired, making this quality made to measure roller blind a perfect addition to room that needs optimum light control.

relproducts.title: Stirlo Porcelain White
relproducts.description: Stirloporcelain whiteplain roller blind the stirlo range boast a fantastic range of dim-out privacy fabrics to compliment any room. The fabric is composed of 100% polyester and is rolled around a strong, rust free aluminium tube. The blind is supplied with a premium control mechanism with white chain used as standard, or a nickel metal chain can be chosen above to upgrade. Supplied with the blinds are installation instructions and universal brackets suitable for top, side and face fixing.

relproducts.title: Cotswold Pebble Grey - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: Cotswold pebble grey is the epitome of modern style blended in perfect harmony with a classic look. The finely poised slats sit proudly in your window space whilst the contemporary pebble grey takes pride of place in even the most modern home. Adding smaller features to the living room like a side lamp and coasters in pebble grey is a great way to create a subtle secondary layer to your decor. Keep the main colours to rich creams and lightly coloured woods and you'll see your favourite new colour really come to the fore.

relproducts.title: Cotswold Monroe Bisque - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: The creamy hue of cotswold monroe bisque is the perfect backdrop you need to create the relaxing and homely atmosphere you'll never want to leave. With a gentle colour that adorns every finely cut slat you'll be able to put your feet up with the peace of mind that you can rest without being disturbed. We love the idea of pairing monroe bisque with a matching rug on a lightly stained floor or a modern laminate floor.

relproducts.title: Cotswold Cosmic White - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: The matt, chalky finish of the cotswold in cosmic white is right on trend, and will work amidst a range of decor schemes. A matching wooden pelmet and bottom rail give this blind a streamlined edge, with no obtrusive detailing detracting from its effect. Perfect for a shabby chic theme in a light, vintage bedroom, the cosmic white will look stunning against sweet duck egg walls. Include pretty floral patterns in the room, whether in the bedlinen or accenting cushions, and don't be afraid to add a complementary shade of pink for extra depth.

relproducts.title: Cotswold Silverton Grey - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: Cotswold silverton grey brings a refreshingly elegant shade into your home by really bringing your window spaces to life. The finely crafted slats allow you to celebrate the way the light dances with the exquisite finish to create a regal aesthetic that is a joy to behold. Turn the upstairs landing into the epitome of understated style by adding silverton grey to your existing decor. Pair it with a matching lampshade and a canvas print to create a homely feel in one of the harder spaces to decorate in the home.

relproducts.title: Cotswold Oatmeal - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: In light, country cream, with a trendy, chalk finish, the cotswold's oatmeal is a pretty and neutral choice. The matt paint makes this blind unobtrusive yet inherently attractive, an effect that is only added to by its coordinating pieces and parts. Partner the oatmeal with a lush sky blue in a child's bedroom, where the pale tone of the blind will allow cute patterns and fun characters on bedlinen and wall hangings to stand out on their own.

relproducts.title: Cotswold Dove Grey - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: Pretty and subtle, the cotswold in dove grey has satin finish, with the faintest of sheens and a detectable wood grain aesthetic and texture. The paint colour is a pale grey, perfect for either contemporary or vintage settings. For a sweet and romantic pastel colour palette, group the dove grey with pale pinks and soft lilacs. Choose one for the walls, or paint opposite walls in each, then furnish the room with painted white or matching grey pieces.

relproducts.title: Cotswold Marble Grey - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: Matt grey, and with matching components, the cotswold in marble grey combines the contemporary with shabby chic, due to its lovely, chalky finish. Sustainable as well as stylish, this blind offers bags of practicality with its heavy duty headrail and thick, durable slats. Construct a feeling of country vintage chic in the dining room by combining the marble grey with a painted white dining table and cute grey and pink accessories.

relproducts.title: Cotswold Soft Grey Roman Blind
relproducts.description: The lightness of the grey in this fabric is a versatile, neutral look that's a dream for both modern homes and rustic schemes, so it's a versatile piece. The major appeal though is in the fabric itself, a tactile and soft weave that you'll almost want to wrap around yourself and the lightness of the grey in this fabric is a versatile, neutral look that's a dream for both modern homes and rustic schemes, so it's a versatile piece.

relproducts.title: Cotswold Ebony - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: Cotswold ebony allows you to take modern decor in an exciting new direction with its unique blend of contemporary colour and classic form. With a slight satin finish sitting against a backdrop of natural light you'll gain a new appreciation for the finer things in life. Turn the master bedroom into your own little oasis away from it all with a little help from cotswold ebony. By opting for crisp white sheets and a selection of ebony scatter cushions, and a matching rug, you'll be able to transform your room in a single afternoon.

relproducts.title: Cotswold Cosmic White Gloss - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: Cosmic indeed, the cotswold's cosmic white gloss is a magically glossy venetian blind, where thick, tilting slats are painted in a deluxe white sheen. All components, including a headrail, bottom rail, and acorns, are finished to a high standard, and are provided in coordinating tones. Bring a bold, vivacious shade of tropical purple to life by painting a feature wall and placing the cosmic white gloss against it.

relproducts.title: Cotswold Deluxe Cosmic White - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: Generate an enchanting window display with the cotswold deluxe in cosmic white, hosting polished, authentic basswood. This elegant arrangement of superior louvres, accompanied by quality components, creates a contemporary, venetian blind that is both practical and easy to install. For an attractive and soothing dcor scheme, display the cosmic white in the bathroom, amongst gleaming white tiles and elegant ceramics.

relproducts.title: Cotswold Deluxe Ghost White - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: Featuring a matt white colouring, wide, sturdy slats, and a heavy duty headrail and pelmet, the cotswold deluxe in ghost white will make a beautiful addition to any home. Coordinating parts, including woven ladder tapes, finish the look off neatly and with style. Set the ghost white against a country floral wallpaper for a rural look in either a contemporary or period property. Pick your favourite colour or two from the paper and use them to accent the room, in the form of throws, cushions, and ornaments.

relproducts.title: Cotswold Deluxe Cosmic White Gloss - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: Bring a plush white sheen into your home by choosing the cosmic white gloss, a shiny painted venetian blind from the cotswold deluxe range. This clean, fresh window dressing has all of the high end features of a designer blind, including coordinating linen ladder tapes and a top quality finish. For an ultra-modern and incredibly striking look in a dining room, go all white. Furnish the room from top to bottom in white, from walls to flooring to furniture, and the cosmic white gloss will fit right in.

relproducts.title: Origin Basic White - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: The origin in basic white is made from heavy gauge aluminium guaranteed not to sag. Its wipe-clean practicality combined with the pure white, satin look finish make this blind an attractive option that is pleasing in both looks and functionality. If it's a fresh, clean style that you're looking for, blend the basic white with an all-white colour palette that's perfect for the bathroom or kitchen.

relproducts.description: Their turin range consists of the most popular venetian blind colours. Look no further for a tailored product at a great price. ?This classic matt white venetian blind is perfect for any room and will blend into any colour scheme. relproducts.title: Cotswold Smoke Grey - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: With the faint sheen of its satin paint, the cotswold in smoke grey places a pale grey tone on thick wooden slats, which are treated to prevent cracking and warping, ensuring that this blind will stand the test of time. A matching pelmet, rails, and acorns provide a sleek and unobstructed appearance. Fashion a plain bedroom into a trendy, up-to-date designer haven by pitting the smoke grey against sunny primrose yellow walls.
